svg.text: Product Development Lifecycle - Role Engagement by Phase
Primary responsibility, decision maker, accountable for outcomes
Active contributor, executes work, regular involvement
Subject matter expert, provides input when needed
Limited or no involvement in this phase
1. Each phase must have a clearly designated LEAD role - shared leadership creates confusion and delays
2. SUPPORT roles are active participants, not just advisors - they have deliverables and deadlines
3. CONSULT roles provide expertise on-demand but aren't in daily standups or sprint planning
4. Role transitions between phases require formal handoffs - don't assume the next lead knows everything
5. MINIMAL doesn't mean uninformed - keep these roles updated on decisions that affect their future work
